flow-definition.description:
The [Security914Test](https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins/blob/96f17d5953fea0f1f45b5fa3de6b4fc35cfb3486/test/src/test/java/jenkins/security/stapler/Security914Test.java#L59) started failing with the UI improvements of [Credentials Plugin 1460.v48765a_c7d849](https://github.com/jenkinsci/credentials-plugin/releases/tag/1460.v48765a_c7d849).
A [pull request](https://github.com/jenkinsci/jenkins/pull/26090) was submitted to fix the tests. This job confirms that the test passes on the Jenkins master branch.
